text: Jean-Pierre Michel (5 August 1938 – 24 January 2021) was a French politician. He was a member of the Senate of France, representing the Haute-Saône department from 2004 to 2014. He was a member of the Socialist Party. Michel was Mayor of Héricourt, Haute-Saône from 1983 to 2004. He was born in Nîmes, France. Michel died on 24 January 2021 in Trévenans, France at the age of 82.Décès de Jean-Pierre Michel, ancien maire d'Héricourt et créateur du PACS ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:People from Nîmes Category:People from Haute-Saône
title: Jean-Pierre Michel
